  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111950</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111950</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kaj vem o živalih 1,2 (izvorna datoteka)</string>
            <string language="en">What do I know about animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ich in Tieren auskennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui je savent des animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que mim sabem sobre animais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa io sanno circa gli animali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που εγώ ξέρει για τα ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué yo saben sobre animales</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izvorna datoteka Hot Potatoes, ki jo lahko prirejate po svojih potrebah.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of quiz type questions regarding animals (2 quizzes). Hot Potatoes source code included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kviz</string>
            <string language="en">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žival</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vprašanje</string>
            <string language="en">question</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Quiztyp Fragen betreffend ist Tiere (2 
Quizen). Heißes Kartoffelquellenprogramm schloß ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de type questions de jeu concernant des 
animaux (2 jeux). Code source chaud de pommes de terre inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo do tipo perguntas do quiz a respeito dos 
animais (2 quizzes). O código de fonte quente das batatas 
incluiu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme del tipo domande di quiz per quanto 
riguarda gli animali (2 quiz). Il codice sorgente caldo delle 
patate ha incluso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο ερωτήσεων τύπων διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων σχετικά 
με τα ζώα (2 διαγωνισμοοι γνώσεων). Καυτός κώδικας πηγής 
πατατών συμπεριλαμβανόμενος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de tipo preguntas del concurso con 
respecto a los animales (2 concursos). Código de fuente 
caliente de las patatas incluido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pergunta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">animale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">domanda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
